name: SystemImpact
description: The SystemImpact class describes the technical impact of the incident to the systems on the network.

Description.name: Description
Description.description: A free-form text description of the impact to the system.

severity.name: severity
severity.description: An estimate of the relative severity of the activity.  The permitted values are shown below.  There is no default value.

completion.name: completion
completion.description: An indication whether the described activity was successful.  The permitted values are shown below.  There is no default value.

type.name: type
type.description: A means by which to extend the type attribute. See Section 5.1.1.
